long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of going through Steam's age check each time you look at a game? Wish you should see more charts and stats about each game? Look no further! Better Steam is a lightweight extension built to improve your experience navigating Steam Store and Steam Community Hub pages.

Key Features:

✅ Skip all age checks on Steam: Automatically bypass Steam age checks on both Store and Community Hub pages. Never enter your birthday again.

✅ Cleaner and faster alternative to SteamDB, Enhanced Steam, and Augmented Steam.

✅ Display helpful game stats: See key game stats like concurrent players, all-time peak players, and the Steambase "Player Score" directly on the Steam Store page. Data is sourced directly from Steambase's Steam database.

✅ Add external links to the best Steam websites: Whether you are looking for a deal on your next game purchase or wanting to learn how well a game runs on the Steam Deck — Better Steam adds links to other sites to help you find the information you need.

Additional Information on Steambase: https://steambase.io

Better Steam is completely open source! Submit a feature request or raise an issue on GitHub: https://github.com/Steambase/Better-Steam-Browser-Extension
